long_description: Looking to escape to your local lake for the day? The Perception Prodigy 10.0 is the perfect combination of performance and value. Extremely stable and easy to paddle, the Prodigy 10.0 is ideal for beginners seeking leisurely afternoon voyages on flatwater and slow rivers. Skid plate on the bottom of the hull increases durability and prolongs life of kayak. Roomy cockpit makes it easy to get in and out of the kayak. Soft yet supportive padded seating offers superb comfort, and an adjustable backpad personalizes the height and the angle of recline. Padded area along the interior combing increases comfort for your legs, and adjustable leg support reduces ankle pressure. Bungee paddle holder frees up hands for nature watching, photography and fishing. The Perception Prodigy 10.0 kayak features adjustable footbraces and ergonomic carry toggles.
short_description: Looking to escape to your local lake for the day? The Perception Prodigy 10.0 is the perfect combination of performance and value.
